name: King Arthur's Gold Map File
summary: Learn about .KAG files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Before the introduction of the KAG format, King Arthur's Gold used plain PNG files which could be edited with any bitmap graphics editor.

description: Map file used by King Arthur's Gold, a 2D medieval game where players mine resources, build castles, and fight enemies; includes the terrain, items, players units, and other objects; used for map the starting conditions.
